author: Regeri Zoo
description: “Imagine a cocktail that meets your every need - no matter the weather, it will bring out the right seasonal flavors: sea buckthorn for autumn, ginger root for the winter, fresh lemongrass for spring and ripe limes for summer. All the best vitamins mixed with BACARDÍ rum!”
name: Four Seasons

recipeInstructions.text: MUDDLE and lemon ginger in base of shaker
Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
